fields.value: Effects of Fair Value Accounting on Investment Portfolio Management: How Fair Is It?

authorAffiliation.value: Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania

dsDescriptionValue.value: The data collection examines the adoption of SFAS 115 by  bank holding companies to determine if a desire to influence the  numbers in the financial statements, including reported equity volatility, affects investment portfolio management.

fields.value: Version Date: 1998-08-27Version Text: 1998-08-27Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: (1) The file submitted is JF95DP.AB, which contains  both the program and the data for the article.
